exchanges.description: NOPA data reflect individual facility metered water use, which includes water used in cooling towers, steam production, and other process-related equipment.

flow.name: Water
flow.category: Elementary flows/resource/water

exchanges.description: NOPA's hexane input and air emissions numbers are based on EPA's Vegetable Oil MACT limit of 0.2 gallon of hexane lost/ton of soybeans processed with an assumed specific gravity of hexane of 5.65 pounds/gallon.  The MACT limit is a "total loss" limit that reflects total hexane disappearance, the vast majority of which is via air emissions.
